Control Name: 5.3 Ensure that anti-virus mechanisms are actively running and cannot be disabled or altered by users, unless specifically authorized by management on a case-by-case basis for a limited time period.

control_attributes.Control: 5.3 Ensure that anti-virus mechanisms are actively running and cannot be disabled or altered by users, unless specifically authorized by management on a case-by-case basis for a limited time period.
control_attributes.Requirement: Requirement 5. Protect all systems against malware and regularly update anti-virus software or programs
